name: Herb-Infused Hair Oil
description: Traditional Ayurvedic hair oil with potent herbs for hair growth and scalp health.
usage: Massage onto scalp twice a week, leave for 2 hours.

name: Natural Glow Face Serum
description: Brightening serum with saffron and sandalwood for a radiant complexion.
usage: Apply 3-4 drops at night on clean face.

name: Pure Ashwagandha Tablets
description: Premium adaptogenic supplement for stress management and vitality.
usage: 1 tablet twice daily after meals.

name: Aloe Vera Soothing Gel
description: Multipurpose cooling gel for skin hydration and sunburn relief.
usage: Apply as needed on skin for cooling effect.

name: Organic Triphala Churna
description: Ancient digestive blend for gut health and detoxification.
usage: 1 tsp with warm water before bed.

name: Brahmi Memory Booster
description: Herbal supplement to enhance cognitive function and mental clarity.
usage: 1 tablet twice daily with water.

name: Neem & Tulsi Face Wash
description: Antibacterial face wash for acne-prone skin and deep cleansing.
usage: Apply on wet face, massage and rinse.

name: Kumkumadi Glow Tailam
description: Precious saffron-infused oil for nighttime skin repair and glow.
usage: Apply 2 drops on face after cleansing at night.

name: Shatavari Vitality Capsules
description: Powerful herb for female hormonal balance and reproductive health.
usage: 1 capsule daily after breakfast.

name: Golden Turmeric Latte Mix
description: Warming blend of turmeric and spices for immunity and wellness.
usage: Mix 1/2 tsp in hot milk or water.

name: Copper Tongue Scraper
description: Essential oral hygiene tool for detoxification and fresh breath.
usage: Gently scrape tongue from back to front in the morning.

name: Amla Immunity Juice
description: Cold-pressed Amla juice rich in Vitamin C for hair and skin health.
usage: 30ml juice with 30ml water in the morning.

name: Tulsi Green Tea Ritual
description: Antioxidant-rich green tea blended with holy basil leaves.
usage: Steep in hot water for 3-5 minutes.

name: Neem & Giloy Tablets
description: Potent blood purifier and immunity booster for seasonal health.
usage: 1 tablet twice daily.

name: Sandalwood Soothing Pack
description: Traditional face pack for cooling the skin and brightening.
usage: Mix with rose water, apply for 15 mins and wash.

name: Pure Desi Ghee (Cow)
description: Traditional bilona ghee for digestion and holistic nutrition.
usage: Use in cooking or consume 1 tsp daily.

name: Rose Water (Gulab Jal)
description: Pure steam-distilled rose water for toning and refreshment.
usage: Spray on face after washing.

name: Shikakai Hair Wash Powder
description: Natural hair cleanser that promotes shine and prevents dandruff.
usage: Make a paste with water, apply to hair and rinse.

name: Jatamansi Stress Relief Oil
description: Calming hair and body oil to promote restful sleep and relax nerves.
usage: Apply on soles of feet or scalp before sleep.

name: Aloe Vera & Neem Soap
description: Handmade herbal soap for glowing and germ-free skin.
usage: Use daily during bath.
